sub_categories.name: Superheroes
sub_categories.details: Superhero Figure is a highly detailed action figure with incredible articulation. It comes with various interchangeable accessories and is suitable for ages 5 and above.

sub_categories.name: Animals
sub_categories.details: Animal Figure is a collection of lifelike animal figures. Each figure is hand-painted and made from high-quality materials, perfect for animal enthusiasts of all ages.

sub_categories.name: Robots
sub_categories.details: Robot Toy is an interactive robot that can walk, talk, and perform various actions. It features voice recognition and programmable movements, providing hours of robotic fun.

description: Toy 1 is an action figure with realistic features and movable limbs. It comes with accessories and is suitable for children aged 5 and above.

sub_categories.name: Fashion Dolls
sub_categories.details: Fashion Doll is a stylish doll with trendy outfits and accessories. It comes with a dressing room playset, allowing kids to create fashionable looks and stories.

sub_categories.name: Baby Dolls
sub_categories.details: Baby Doll is an adorable doll with realistic features and soft body. It includes accessories such as a bottle and pacifier, providing nurturing play for young children.

description: Toy 2 is a beautiful doll with long hair and a variety of fashionable outfits. It also includes accessories for dressing up and styling the doll's hair.

sub_categories.name: Jigsaw Puzzles
sub_categories.details: Jigsaw Puzzle is a challenging puzzle with 1000 pieces. It features a beautiful landscape and high-quality printing, providing hours of entertainment for puzzle enthusiasts.

sub_categories.name: 3D Puzzles
sub_categories.details: 3D Puzzle is an innovative puzzle that allows you to build three-dimensional structures. It stimulates spatial reasoning and comes with detailed instructions for assembly.

description: Toy 3 is a challenging puzzle with 500 pieces. It features a beautiful landscape and is perfect for improving problem-solving skills in both kids and adults.

sub_categories.name: Basic Blocks
sub_categories.details: Basic Building Blocks is a set of classic building blocks in various shapes and colors. It encourages imaginative play and helps develop fine motor skills in children.

sub_categories.name: Magnetic Blocks
sub_categories.details: Magnetic Building Blocks are magnetic tiles that allow children to create structures with ease. The strong magnets ensure stability, making it ideal for constructing tall buildings.

description: Toy 4 is a set of building blocks that allow children to construct various structures. It stimulates creativity and helps develop fine motor skills.

sub_categories.name: Cars
sub_categories.details: Toy Car is a collection of miniature cars with realistic designs. Each car features smooth-rolling wheels and is made from durable materials, ensuring long-lasting fun.

sub_categories.name: Trucks
sub_categories.details: Toy Truck is a rugged truck toy that can haul various objects. It comes with movable parts and detachable accessories, providing an immersive play experience.

description: Toy 5 is a collection of toy vehicles including cars, trucks, and helicopters. It provides hours of fun and imaginative play for kids of all ages.
